name: Out of Body, Out of Home
name_original: Out of Body, Out of Home
description:
Your mad science has finally caught up to you, the rocket propelled vacuum cleaner was a step to far and when it activated it knocked you right out of your body! Now it's out of control and taking  your house and your body with it, use your new found spectral terraforming powers to keep your house in-tact and body alive.

Controls: Hover over the terrain with your mouse, use left click to raise and right click to lower the terrain, both affect the vacuum's rotation. Stay alive as long as you can.

House health is displayed in the upper-left hand corner, hitting rocks and fallen trees will damage it, picking up boxes of supplies will fix it up.
